name: siteous it!
author: Muhammad Zamroni

sections.description:
My buddy, Adham Somantrie, has written a great URL shortener called Siteo.us. This service is still in alpha phase, but I believe it will reach great features.

Based on its development blog, I wrote a piece of WP plugin code to make this thing easier to use.

After installed and activated, the plugin will add a “siteous and share” link button on your bottom of posts. You can easily convert your post URL link into short URL and share it to everyone using Siteous.
sections.installation: All you have to do is just grab the siteous-it.phps file, rename it to siteous-it.php, upload it to your WP plugins directory, and then activate the plugin. It’s just that simple.
sections.faq:
Do I have to add some code into theme files?

No you don’t. You even don’t need to touch the theme files.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First and simple version of plugin
  • Made while waiting for Taraweh praying time.

short_description: This plugin adds Siteous (a short URLs service provider) button on your posts to shortify your post URL.
